data.comment: The big names in today's match at Ghelamco Arena have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Gent at Ghelamco Arena.
Kortrijk awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Ghent a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 5, Gent's Alessio Castro-Montes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kortrijk have a goal kick.
Gent to take a throw-in in Kortrijk territory.
In the minute 7, Free kick Gent.
Gent surge into the attack at Ghelamco Arena but Roman Yaremchukâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ghent.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Kortrijk.
Ball safe as Gent is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gent in the half of Kortrijk.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Kortrijk in their own half.
Can Gent get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kortrijk's half?
Nicolas Laforge awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Gent goal kick.
Free kick for Kortrijk in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Gent at Ghelamco Arena.
Kortrijk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nicolas Laforge signals a Kortrijk throw-in in Gent's half.
In the minute 14, Kortrijk to take a throw-in in Gent territory.
Nicolas Laforge awards Gent a goal kick.
Kortrijk needs to be cautious. Gent have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Kortrijk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Kortrijk in their own half.
Kortrijk are pushing forward but Terem Moffi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 19, Gent have a goal kick.
Gent are coming forward and Roman Yaremchuk gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ghent.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Kortrijk.
Throw-in for Kortrijk in the half of Gent.
Terem Moffi is on target to give Kortrijk a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 22, Christophe Lepoint instrumental with a fine assist.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Gent in their own half.
Kortrijk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Gent.
Free kick for Gent in the half of Kortrijk.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Kortrijk in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kortrijk in Ghent.
Corner awarded to Kortrijk.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Kortrijk at Ghelamco Arena.
Throw-in for Kortrijk in their own half.
Throw-in for Kortrijk at Ghelamco Arena.
In the minute 36, Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Gent.
Gent have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Ball goes out of play for a Kortrijk goal kick.
In the minute 38, In Ghent a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gent's Roman Yaremchuk gets in a shot on goal at Ghelamco Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gent's Roman Yaremchuk is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 40, Gent have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Gent's Michael Ngadeu goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Gent drive upfield and Elisha Owusu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kortrijk defender.
In the minute 42, Kortrijk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kortrijk in their own half.
Nicolas Laforge signals a Kortrijk throw-in in Gent's half.
In the minute 45, Hannes Van Der Bruggen for Kortrijk drives towards goal at Ghelamco Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kortrijk.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Kortrijk.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Gent in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Gent close to the penalty box.
The first-half has ended.
Evgen Makarenko for Kortrijk has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Nicolas Laforge awards Kortrijk a goal kick.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Elisha Owusu with Laurent Depoitre. This is the first substitution made today by Jess Thorup.
Nicolas Laforge signals a throw-in for Gent, close to Kortrijk's area.
In the minute 49, In Ghent Kortrijk drive forward through Christophe Lepoint. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Kortrijk.
Gent's Sven Kums gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kortrijk defender.
In the minute 50, Kortrijk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Gent get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kortrijk's half?
Ilombe Mboyo of Kortrijk gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Gent at Ghelamco Arena.
Can Gent capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kortrijk's half?
Throw-in for Kortrijk at Ghelamco Arena.
In the minute 53, Kortrijk awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gent in Ghent.
In the minute 54, Gent make their second substitution with Roman Bezus replacing Niklas Dorsch.
Roman Yaremchuk gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gent.
Gent have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
In the minute 55, Gent push upfield and Michael Ngadeu gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Kortrijk defence.
Nicolas Laforge awards the home team a throw-in.
Gent have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Tim Kleindienst is on a sub for Anderson Niangbo for Gent.
In the minute 59, Terem Moffi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goal! Igor Plastun (Gent) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 59, That's a fine assist from Sven Kums.
Terem Moffi is back on the pitch.
The away team has substituted Terem Moffi with Habib Gueye. Yves Vanderhaeghe is thus making his first change.
In the minute 61, Kortrijk have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Kortrijk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kortrijk close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, In Ghent Kortrijk attack through Hannes Van Der Bruggen. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gent goal kick.
Free kick Gent.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Gent in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Gent!
Gent drives forward and Alessio Castro-Montes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Gent.
Throw-in Kortrijk.
Nicolas Laforge blows against Kortrijk's Eric Ocansey for offside.
In the minute 67, Can Gent get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kortrijk's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ghent.
Throw-in for Gent in their own half.
In the minute 71, Nicolas Laforge awards the away team a throw-in.
Gent's Vadis Odjidja breaks free at Ghelamco Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nicolas Laforge awards Kortrijk a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Kortrijk.
Kortrijk attack but Lucas Rougeaux's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Gent at Ghelamco Arena.
In the minute 74, Gent to take a throw-in in Kortrijk territory.
Gent have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Gent's Tim Kleindienst attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Kortrijk goal kick.
Nicolas Laforge signals a Gent throw-in in Kortrijk's half.
Faiz Selemani is replacing Christophe Lepoint for Kortrijk at Ghelamco Arena.
In the minute 80, Gent have a dangerous throw-in.
Tim Kleindienst (Gent) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Gent in the half of Kortrijk.
In the minute 82, Laurent Depoitre gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gent.
Throw-in for Kortrijk at Ghelamco Arena.
Nicolas Laforge signals a throw-in for Kortrijk, close to Gent's area.
In the minute 83, Hannes Van Der Bruggen puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Great play from Ilombe Mboyo to set up the goal.
Free kick for Gent in the half of Kortrijk.
In the minute 85, Gent pushes forward through Roman Yaremchuk, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ilombe Mboyo of Kortrijk smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Kortrijk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gent's half?
In the minute 87, Gent needs to be cautious. Kortrijk have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Kortrijk.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Nicolas Laforge signals a Kortrijk throw-in in Gent's half.
Habib Gueye (Kortrijk) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ghent.
Kortrijk have a goal kick.
At Ghelamco Arena the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Roman Bezus for Gent drives towards goal at Ghelamco Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Gent have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Gent get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kortrijk's half?
Lucas Rougeaux for Kortrijk is back on the field again.
Ball safe as Gent is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicolas Laforge awards Gent a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Ghent to check on Lucas Rougeaux, who is grimacing with pain.
Yves Vanderhaeghe is making the team's third substitution at Ghelamco Arena with Abdul Ajagun replacing Ilombe Mboyo.
